attributes.action: Please help us stop the cherries respite service for children  in Chichester West Sussex closing
attributes.additional_details: As parents of disabled children we are trying to act quickly to stop commissioners choosing to close our local children's respite home ,the cherries it's a small beautifull place with wonderfull caring staff who put our children first , for many children the home is 5 minutes walk from school , the nhs funds the home and children have to meet hight criteria to get a place ,this could be changed to joint funding so more children could use the service , this is what we want .  the commissioners have 3 options and one is to close us down , please sign to stop this being what they choose , our children love it there and many parents like myself cannot cope without this wonderfull service , please please sign , ask friends and family to sign . Thank you for any support
